p.k: Odelion Orchestra is vocalist-composer Margriet Sjoerdsma's project with pianist Jeroen van Vliet, the electric string trio Westside Trio, and three horn players. The group's debut album was recorded at a sold-out Het Muziekcentrum van de Omroep.
p.d: Jazz festival slash conference inJazz brings together the supply and demand sides of the Dutch jazz scene, helping artists share knowledge and experiences and stimulating the development of international relationships. The conference program includes inspiring panel discussions, workshops, networking sessions and presentations. During the night, promising Dutch jazz acts as well as more seasoned groups hit the stage to show what they're capable of. One of the bands performing at inJazz is the Odelion Orchestra, a project by vocalist-composer Margriet Sjoerdsma with pianist Jeroen van Vliet, the electric string trio Westside Trio, and three horn players. The group's debut album was recorded at a sold-out Het Muziekcentrum van de Omroep. Their inJazz performance offers a foretaste of their national tour, which kicks off at the Amsterdam Concertgebouw.
